readingMnemonic: You look around and everyone is <kanji>obese</kanji> like you. You try to reach out to them, but you roll over like a big <reading>bow</reading>ling (ぼう) ball. The person next to you does too. Soon you're all rolling around like helpless, obese bowling balls.
meaningMnemonic: When the <radical>moon</radical> faces the right <radical>direction</radical>, everyone on earth becomes <kanji>obese</kanji>. The pull of the moon moves all the water on earth as well as inside us, so when it faces the right way, we all get super <kanji>fat</kanji>.
